1513690953_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body:
Hi gitcenter. Thanks for all your help with this. 

It's been a crazy two months of very little sleep and many times it's probably been our fault for not reading through the docs as well as we should. In some cases, like ZeroTalk, which we are new with, we're not even sure where to find the docs on ZeroNet. But it's great that we're making progress now. 

So, just out of curiosity, how would I delete a post? I can't see any button. Only reply.

> [gitcenter](#comment_5_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Also, feel free to ask me for help whenever on ZeroMe or ZeroMail. [...]

Thanks for the offer to help. I am set as admin in content.json, but I only get the pencil on my own topics for some reason.

    "settings": {
      "admin": "voiceofthewind",
      "admin_href": "http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=voiceofthewind",
      "topic_sticky_uris": ["2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj", "8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj"]
     },

> [gitcenter](#comment_6_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): You also need to check This is my site in sidebar (and sign content.json afterwards).

I've tried this and published several times over the last few days, including right now but I still don't get any option to delete posts other than mine for some reason...
